channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA

item.title: CVE-2021-24569|2024-08-03T19:35:20.186Z -- unknown -- cookie%20notice%20%26%20compliance%20for%20gdpr%20%2F%20ccpa
item.description: The Cookie Notice & Compliance for GDPR / CCPA WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 does not escape the value of its Button Text setting when outputting it in an attribute in the frontend, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
